item.name: Buckley's Run Vineyard
item.address1: 50 Stony Creek Road, Red Hill, Vic 3937 (postal)
item.description: In 1998 Gabrielle Johnston purchased the 17ha property; 3ha of pinot gris had been established; the property also has 165 olive trees and an established Arabian horse stud. Most of the grapes have been sold over the years, but with small amounts made under the Buckleys Run label by a passing parade of winemakers. In 2006 Gabrielle joined with five other small vineyards without their own cellar door to form a group called The Local Collection (TLC as a double entendre) at Noels Gallery Restaurant with over 20 wines available for tasting and matching with the food at the restaurant.
